sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const [showExpiryAlert, setShowExpiryAlert] = useState(true); const [selectedMedicine, setSelectedMedicine] = useState(null); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const expiringMedicines = [ { id: 1, name: 'Ventolin Inhaler', category: 'Respiratory', currentStock: 89, daysUntilExpiry: 25, reorderPoint: 50, manufacturer: 'GSK', storageLocation: 'Storage C-02', serialNumber: 'VEN-2024-001', expiryDate: '2024-05-15', status: 'Attention', unit: 'tablets' }, // Add more medicines as needed ]; const supplies = [ { id: 1, name: 'Analgesics', image: '/images/aspirin.png', category: 'Pain Relief' }, { id: 2, name: 'Antibiotics', image: '/images/antibiotics.png', category: 'Infection' }, { id: 3, name: 'Hypoglycemics', image: '/images/glucose.png', category: 'Diabetes' }, { id: 4, name: 'Sedatives', image: '/images/sedatives.png', category: 'Sleep' }, { id: 5, name: 'Tranquilizer', image: '/images/tranquilizer.png', category: 'Anxiety' }, { id: 6, name: 'Vitamins', image: '/images/vitamins.png', category: 'Supplements' }, ]; const handleMedicineClick = (medicine) => { setSelectedMedicine(medicine); setShowModal(true); }; return (

Code Vortex

Hello, {user.username}!

3
{showExpiryAlert && (

Medicines Expiring Soon!

{expiringMedicines.map(medicine => (

{medicine.name}

Expires on: {medicine.expiryDate}

{medicine.daysUntilExpiry} days left
))}
)}

Welcome to Code Vortex!

Manage your medical supplies proactively.

Supplies

{supplies.map((supply) => (

{supply.name}

{supply.category}

))}

Expiring Soon {expiringMedicines.length} items

{expiringMedicines.map(medicine => (
handleMedicineClick(medicine)} >

{medicine.name}

{medicine.category}
{medicine.daysUntilExpiry} days {medicine.status}
))}
{showModal && selectedMedicine && (

{selectedMedicine.name}

{selectedMedicine.category}

Current Stock

{selectedMedicine.currentStock}

{selectedMedicine.unit}

Days Until Expiry

{selectedMedicine.daysUntilExpiry}

days remaining

Reorder Point

{selectedMedicine.reorderPoint}

minimum stock

Product Information

{selectedMedicine.manufacturer}

{selectedMedicine.storageLocation}

{selectedMedicine.serialNumber}

{selectedMedicine.expiryDate}

{selectedMedicine.daysUntilExpiry <= 30 && (

Expiry Warning

Product will expire in {selectedMedicine.daysUntilExpiry} days

)}
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
